suppress.notes: https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2016-1000027 Root Cause: spring-web-5.2.3.RELEASE.jar <= org/springframework/remoting/httpinvoker/HttpInvokerServiceExporter.class : [2.5.1,) Pivotal Spring Framework 4.1.4 suffers from a potential remote code execution (RCE) issue if used for Java deserialization of untrusted data. Depending on how the library is implemented within a product, this issue may or not occur, and authentication may be required Note: No java deserialization of untrusted data is happening in this component therefore it is suppressed.

False positive. These vulnerabilities actually affect Spring Security, but dependencyCheck is mixing them up with spring-boot-starter-oauth2-resource-server. Resolution of these false positives hasn't been resolved yet in the latest dependencyCheck upgrade. https://github.com/jeremylong/DependencyCheck/issues/3622
False positive. This is addressed in snake yaml 1.32 revision, however CVEs DB is still not updated to reflect it. https://bitbucket.org/snakeyaml/snakeyaml/issues/531/stackoverflow-oss-fuzz-47081
